description: bust portrait of girl with three cherry blossoms in her hair, wearing a white gown with gold and red collar, holding a large dark blue-purple iris; gold ground
marks: in bottom margin, in pencil: Japanese inscription in bottom margin, in pencil: [K. Sugiura \'84]
text: Sugiura was born in Kyoto in 1938 and is well known for his flowers silkscreened on a gold leaf background. The gold leaf is hand applied on the Japanese paper in the same technique as for folding screens. He then silkscreens his floral subjects onto the gold leaf. Sugiura has become famous for creating over 100 different interpretations of irises.
title: Young Girl with Iris
